body.name: Baby Spinning Stacking Toys for Toddlers 1-3, Rainbow Ring Stacker Montessori Toys for Babies 6-12 Months, 1 2 3 One Year Old Girl Boy Christmas Birthday Gifts, Autism Sensory Learning Toy

features: 【Stack and Spin Toys】The JUXUE stacking spinning toy has a simple but creative design, consisting of a screw rod and rainbow-colored wheel, your child can use it to spin the discs to the ground. Each disc has 2 colors, can be rotated arbitrarily, great for toddlers age 1+.

【Endless happy hour】Children can stack the discs by size, color, shape or random; when the stacking is complete, pull the pole off the base and watch all the discs slowly rotate and fall to the ground; flip to set the base to choose to shake or fix; Alternatively, you can hold the pole at both ends and let the disc spin up and down endlessly.

【Brain Development Learning】This toddler spinning toy is not only fun, but also an excellent learning toy for little ones. Helps develop hand-eye coordination, cause-and-effect learning, dexterity and fine motor skills during play. Toddlers can also practice color recognition and tactile exploration.

【Durable and Safe】The spin stacking toy is made of sturdy and durable ABS plastic, which is durable, comfortable to touch, BPA free, and passed the strict safety toy test to ensure your child has a good play environment.

【Best Gifts for Toddlers】This rainbow stacking toy is a Christmas, Thanksgiving or birthday gift for girls and boys ages 1 and up, it can be a great family activity to keep kids away from the screen while still Can have fun.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Fun Stacking Spinning Toys Put the fun discs on the threaded rod and they will spin quickly and smoothly to the base to improve your baby's hands-on ability and creativity.

We encourage children to unleash their potential through play Little baby,use your creativity to stack everything you want!!! Hand-Eye CoordinationSorting, Color-RecognitionChunky Discs, Unique Textures – Inspires Tactile ExplorationSpinning discs instill a sense of wonderCause-and-Effect LearningCreative PlayEasy for Little Hands to GraspBPA-free – Exceptionally Safe

Spinning & Stacking toys The rotating disc moves down the threaded rod, spinning in a mesmerizing way. Multiple ways to play You can build it at will according to your child's ideas, or they can be stacked according to the size, so that the baby can learn to sort by size. Dual-purpose base Flip the base to choose either wobbly or sturdy, setting the base is half the fun for your kid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun, interactive gift
reviews.reviewText: Got this for a Christmas present and it’s loved by all ages! So fun to play with. So far proves to be durable, teaches them some new skills and most of all, they love it and have fun

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Toddler love this toy!
reviews.reviewText: My one year old loves to play with this toy. From watching them spin down to flipping it over to start all over again. Gives her entertainment for hours!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars One of the best baby toys
reviews.reviewText: One of the best toys for kids! Bought this for my son who is 1. We use this for kids in therapy as well. Good for fine motor skills, interesting for kids with the spinning! Love the colors. Easy for kids to place on. Only downfall is the bottom piece falls off easily with the other pieces. We ended up gluing on the bottom piece to help it stay standing and not have to put it back together all of the time. But overall, love this toy!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Holds 1 to 2 year olds attention…great for hand eye coordination too!

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Most have for your toddler!
reviews.reviewText: This toy was such a hit with my son during Christmas. It is still his favorite toy by far. Helps with fine motor skills and learning colors. Definitely a must have in our household.
